```{r}

data <- read.csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")

head(data)
names(data)

baltimore_homicides <- data %>%
  filter(city == "Baltimore") %>%
  mutate(reported_date = ymd (reported_date),
          month = month(reported_date),
          year = year(reported_date))


```

```{r}
monthly_homicides <- baltimore_homicides %>% 
  group_by(year, month)

```
